module.name: FreePBX Framework
module.changelog: *13.0.1alpha31* Bubble up tab switches from lower level items *13.0.1alpha30* FREEPBX-9002 Trigger event on successful completion of Apply Config, FREEPBX-8998 Invalid group when updating ring group 0 *13.0.1alpha29* Prep first offical UTF8 release *13.0.1alpha28* FREEPBX-8984 OOBE fails because path is staticly set *13.0.1alpha27* FREEPBX-8984 OOBE path fixes *13.0.1alpha26* Language updates *13.0.1alpha25* Dont redeclare the less class *13.0.1alpha24* Chown Class fixes *13.0.1alpha23* DB class connect method addition *13.0.1alpha22* Fixed issue with modules extending gui elements *13.0.1alpha21* cant only have comments in else statements of bash scripts *13.0.1alpha20* FREEPBX-8953 sticks navbar to top of page. *13.0.1alpha19* Fixes to inputs *13.0.1alpha18* Fix module admin *13.0.1alpha17* During class_exists() checks dont run autoloaders *13.0.1alpha10-16* Installer fixes and tweaks *13.0.1alpha9* Display message in the GUI if the autoloader is malfunctioning *13.0.1alpha8* New CLI command, --fix-zend which fixes broken zended files *13.0.1alpha7* On install update LESS cache. Fix upgrade installer *13.0.1alpha6* Set moh correctly, permissions *13.0.1alpha5* Prettify installer. Hopefully fix issues *13.0.1alpha4* Fix getAssoc in DB wrapper, cleanup installer *13.0.1alpha3* Escape all of the exceptions, fixes to installer as well *13.0.1alpha2* First attempted release. Complete visual overhaul using bootstrap. Action buttons on every page. Global search functionality. Namespace everything. Using core PHP symfony technologies. Replacement of installer, replacement of amportal. *13.0.1alpha1* Removed depreciated PearDB. *12.0.43* FREEPBX-8872 Revert static QUEUES_UPDATECDR removal *12.0.42* FREEPBX-8853 - Fix regression in PKCS *12.0.41* Implement enhanced OOBE infrastructure *12.0.40* FREEPBX-8676 lookup ASTETCDIR for writeConfigs *12.0.39* Enhancments to PKCS infrastructure *12.0.38* Localization updates *12.0.37* FREEPBX-8650 *12.0.36* Unlock UCP fixes (adding ip address restrictions) *12.0.35* FREEPBX-8491, Makes security and update notices come from address set in sysadmin, FREEPBX-8380 Exclude Update Notifications for Disabled Modules, FREEPBX-8287 some work on less to css generation *12.0.34* FREEPBX-8632 Third Party Key Signatures not working *12.0.33* Autologin param was failing validation *12.0.32* Fix Module Admin caching issue *12.0.31* Increase reload time by setting a timeout on gpg key check *12.0.30* Speedier check online, FREEPBX-8491 Update Notices Not Coming from Correct E-mail *12.0.29* Simple fix as a last result situation *12.0.28* Display notice for switching out of beta mode in module admin *12.0.27* Method find functionality fixes *12.0.26* Performance improvements *12.0.25* If there is a problem with GPG dont kill FreePBX *12.0.24* Be smarter about setting the permissions *12.0.23* Permissions on freepbx.conf *12.0.22* FREEPBX-8506 amportal chown should chown asterisk home directory *12.0.20* FREEPBX-8410 Permissions *12.0.21* Dont restrict mons during UCP CLI commands *12.0.20* Enable astman during some UCP CLI commands *12.0.19* FREEPBX-8403 During the cron job nightly check send output into the background *12.0.18* Word wrap in the installer window *12.0.17* Set button default value to a truth false, not a truthy false *12.0.16* Define default layout additions or it breaks *12.0.15* Layout changes and additions *12.0.14* FREEPBX-8402 Syntax in GPG *12.0.13* Beta track module admin fixes *12.0.12* Better backtracing when exceptions are thrown to users *12.0.11* FREEPBX-8258 Replace instead of insert *12.0.10* Better module signing text *12.0.9* Sub Depends checking *12.0.8* Catch exceptions gracefully *12.0.7* FREEPBX-8213 Stop never ending CLI install loops *12.0.6* Remove the last of the sounds from the sounds folder *12.0.5* FREEPBX-8190 signature fixes, FREEPBX-8102 allow modules to be removed that have missing dependencies *12.0.4* KV Recovery and fixes for installer *12.0.3* Fixes to check online *12.0.2* First Stable Release of 12
module.description: This module provides a facility to install bug fixes to the framework code that is not otherwise housed in a module
